Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to subsidized delivery of packages to military members on active duty
Summary: Directs division of military and naval affairs to subsidize mailing of 1 package a month from family of active duty military personnel to such person on active duty.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the military law, in relation to directing the division of military and naval affairs to establish a program to subsidize the mailing of packages between members of the organized militia or of the reserve forces of the armed forces of the United States and their families
